com.paulmender.android.widget

Class GridLayoutManagerAutofit

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager
      • android.support.v7.widget.LinearLayoutManager
        • android.support.v7.widget.GridLayoutManager
          • com.paulmender.android.widget.GridLayoutManagerAutofit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemTouchHelper.ViewDropHandler, RecyclerView.SmoothScroller.ScrollVectorProvider

    public class GridLayoutManagerAutofit
extends GridLayoutManager
    Custom grid layout manager that calculates the span value based on the columnWidth, screen size and thus fills the entire screen with the grid. Created by Paul on 9/11/2017. References: Diep Nguyen, https://codentrick.com/part-4-android-recyclerview-grid/

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager
